definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the projection from the vestibular nuclei to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠前庭神經核羣向脊髓的投射纖維特徵。

sentences.english: Vestibular tree I planted red and blue, to see the second spring buds.
sentences.chinese: 前庭手種紅蘭樹，看到春風第二芽。

sentences.english: Humans are born with 30, 000 cochlear and vestibular hair cells per ear.
sentences.chinese: 人類每隻耳朵有3萬耳蝸毛細胞和前庭毛細胞。

sentences.english: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV) is the most frequent vestibular disorder.
sentences.chinese: 良性陣發性體位性眩暈是最常見的前庭病症。

sentences.english: The secretions of the greater vestibular glands (Bartholin's glands) can never contain sperm cells.
sentences.chinese: 前庭大腺的分泌物從不可能含有精子。

sentences.english: The guards are changed in the morning in the forecourt behind the railings.
sentences.chinese: 警衛是在前庭的欄杆後面完成每天早上的換班的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mechanism for the experimental vestibule damage in endolymphatic hydrops.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討實驗性膜迷路積水前庭損害的機制。

sentences.english: Two small contractile vacuoles located near ventral wall of infundibulum.
sentences.chinese: 兩個小伸縮泡位於口前庭的腹緣。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the audiological characteristics of children with large vestibular aqueduct syndrome (LVAS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童大前庭導水管綜合徵的聽力學特點。

sentences.english: This oral vestibular shield has been specially designed for those people who snore with their mouth open.
sentences.chinese: 這種口腔前庭盾是專爲那些張着嘴打鼾的人們設計的。

sentences.english: Objective To define the effects of intense infrasound on vestibular function in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察強次聲波對豚鼠前庭功能的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of nasal vestibular cyst treatment with uncover method under nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察鼻內鏡下揭蓋術治療鼻前庭囊腫的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Two contractile vacuoles situated near ventral wall of infundibulum.
sentences.chinese: 兩個小伸縮泡，遠遠分離，位於口前庭腹面。

sentences.english: The size of the facial nerve and cochleovestibular nerve in IAC has individual difference.
sentences.chinese: IAC內面神經及耳蝸前庭神經粗細存在個體差異。

sentences.english: Conclusion The earlier performance of acoustic neuroma is the abnormal function of cochlea and forecourt.
sentences.chinese: 結論聽神經瘤早期臨牀表現爲耳蝸與前庭功能異常。

sentences.english: Posterior nasal vestibular fornix there is a from the front line to the back-outside deeper pressure trace.
sentences.chinese: 鼻前庭穹窿後方可見由前內向後外走行的較深壓跡。

definition: winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
